        public Flag(java.lang.String name,
    Struct valueSet,
    Term defValue,
    boolean modifiable,
    java.lang.String library)
        Builds a Prolog flag
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the flag
        valueSet - is the Prolog list of the possible values
        defValue - is the default value
        modifiable - states if the flag is modifiable
        library - is the library defining the flag
